lines.text: You don't get the idea, mister. These cops banging those pans, flashing those lights, they're gonna scare that poor cat of mine. Cats are funny, mister. They don't want to hurt you, but if you scare them they go crazy. These cops, they don't know what they're doing.
I'll pay you tomorrow.
Next time you come. Poor don't cheat one another. We're all poor together.
Mamacita, let me in! Let me in! Let me in! If you love me, let me in!
[first lines]
It may sound like music to her. I can do better with my teeth in a cold shower.
Don't take this personally Miss Walker, but it's ironic - I mean, you being a big star and me being a cigarette girl.
I know, I know. You got the talent and I got the breaks. I heard it in every nightclub.
I thought you'd might like to strut the kitten right in the middle of her act.
If you got cold feet honey, I'll take over for you. That little red dress of yours fits me just perfect.
Someday you'll try on my coffin and I hope it fits you just perfect.
This is a bad town for blondes.

[referring to Jerry]
Wish he'd "Front Page" for me.
You will meet a rich man and he will give you money.
You and your cards! 'Meet a rich man'. I look for them with money. And what rich man hasn't money? And for what was I born, if not for money? You're not telling me anything.
Don't you want to see what I cooked up?
That's easy - me!

I thought... Is Kiki just gonna walk out there tonight? Just walk out on the floor cold in front of a bunch of 'gawkes'? That I think a Spanish twirler is the greatest thing in life? No. Not my client. She's gonna make an entrance that this towns gonna remember for the rest of their lives.

[referring to the leopard]
On his back I suppose!
When you marry champagne, you can't trade it in for beer. You're stuck with it.
I don't understand that fancy talk.
We're not going to catch a train - we're going to catch a murderer.

[to Jerry]
We're not going to catch a train, Darling - we're going to stay right here and catch a murderer.
Must get lonely here.
No.I have many friends... but they don't bother me with talk.
